StarFlier::

She looked at Perceptor with optics wide open. "Ohh, those vile and 
really mean maximal. TOrturing predacons like that. Making them do 
things that are not right. We have to stop them from doing that any 
more. It's one thing to get into fights. But to do what they do is so 
very, very wrong. Perceptor, we have to stop them. We can't let them 
continue to do what they have been doing. I want to fight."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> "Well my dear and innocent girl" said the male "let me tell you why 
> Maximals and Preds are enemies..."
> 
> Perceptor started to told her Preds and Maxi's story, but in that 
> way that Maxis seemed to be evils
